Smart Frame: A picture frame that uses AI technology to enhance the viewing experience.
Interactive Mirror: A picture frame that doubles as a mirror, allowing users to take selfies and share them directly from the frame.
Personalized Memory Frame: A picture frame that uses AI to create a personalized video montage of a person's life.
Augmented Reality Frame: A picture frame that overlays digital information onto real-world objects.
Social Media Frame: A picture frame that allows users to display their social media feeds on their wall.
